titles.title: Blessed Be The Name Of The Lord

properties.copyright: 1984 House Of Mercy Music, Administered by House Of Mercy Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Most High

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The name of the Lord is a strong tower
The righteous run into it and they are saved
(repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is the name of the Lord
Jesus is the name of the Lord
Jesus is the name of the Lord
Most High
